name: Far Cry 4: Arena Master
summary:
Become the arena master with Far Cry 4 Arena Master, the official Far Cry4 app. Collect animals and mercenary fighters for your own personal arena pen and send them to battle against other Far Cry4 players for fame and fortune.

Far Cry 4 Arena Master can be linked directly to your Far Cry4 game, allowing you to share your arena progress and send custom Far Cry 4 arena challenges to your friends. Playing Far Cry 4 arena can also unlock new fighters in the Far Cry 4 Arena Master app.

The choice is yours, play Far Cry 4 Arena Master as either a standalone game or as a companion to your Far Cry4 experience.
